page.title: 02AGHADOWEY-INTRODUCTION(2)
page.content: The{1985 summer}was very bad.It {rained}at some part of every day for 3 months.Sometimes the rain was very heavy indeed and roads,fields and houses were{flooded}and rivers overflowed. { Farmers}had great difficulty in making{hay,}cutting{silage}and harvesting their{barley.}On some farms most of the crop was lost.Many {potatoes}were blighted and others have rotted in the wet ground. On{Thursday 25th July}there was a great{thunderstorm}which lasted for 12 hours and the lightning was so severe that many people were terrified and thought it was the end of the world.Some{animals were killed}in the fields and{houses damaged}by the lightning.Old people,some as old as 90 could not remember{a summer as bad as {this one.
